title: TOTALS BY ASSEMBLY DISTRICT IN CITYWIDE ELECTIONS; MAYOR

body: FLORENCE, Mass. THE books began arriving in a flood here at the National Yiddish Book Exchange last summer as soon as word went out that a handful of young scholars were attempting to rescue the brief but intense literary flowering of a rapidly dying culture. Some books arrived strapped in battered cardboard suitcases that looked convincingly as if
title: YIDDISH BOOK COLLECTION GROWS IN NEW ENGLAND
